Poliuto [unknown arranger]
Langford, Bedfordshire, England, UK 6 bands competed. Langford Flower Show.
March: 1. Peterboro Excelsior, 2. Bedford, 3. Peterboro Silver
The adjudicator said that never in his life had he heard anything so bad as the playing of Arlesey Band!
Prizes: £8, £6, £5
